name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display Reddit images natively in browser

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays Reddit image links directly in the browser by modifying the HTTP Accept header.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Restores the original behaviour when loading images on Reddit.  With this extension, images will load directly into Edge by modifying the HTTP Accept header, which allows them to bypass the Reddit image preview screen.
